title: What Are the Luckiest Numbers for Pisces?

steps.title: Pisces’ most powerful lucky numbers are 3, 7, and 9.
steps.content: Pisces’ most powerful lucky numbers are 3, 7, and 9. These numbers resonate with a Pisces’ creative and sensitive spirit and lead them to good luck and fortune. [1] X Research source Other lucky numbers for Pisces include 0, 4, 12, 15, and 24. [2] X Research source [3] X Research source Use these lucky numbers to plan important dates or increase your chances of winning the lottery . [4] X Research source For example, if you want to ask out your crush, talk to them on the 3rd, 7th, or 9th of the month for a “yes” answer.

Pisces are generally friendly, intuitive, emotional, selfless people. Born between February 19 and March 20, a Pisces individual is extremely empathetic and sensitive. Pisces is the most intuitive of the zodiac signs and is highly creative, imaginative, and connected to the arts. [5] X Research source Strengths: Compassionate and empathetic, creative, artistic, intuitive, gentle, wise, musical Weaknesses: Fearful, overly trusting, sad and emotional, prefer daydreaming to facing reality, playing a victim or martyr Symbol: 2 fish swimming in opposite directions Element: Water Ruling planets: Neptune, Jupiter Modality: Mutable

steps.title: Best zodiac compatibility: Cancer or Scorpio
steps.content: Best zodiac compatibility: Cancer or Scorpio Water signs are deeply emotional, and Cancer and Scorpio have an edge over the other zodiac signs when it comes to understanding Pisces’ sensitivity and emotional needs. The earth signs—Taurus, Virgo, and Capricorn—also make good partners for Pisces . Their grounded and practical nature can balance Pisces’ dreamy, idealistic ways.

steps.title: Best careers: doctor, vet, artist, or priest
steps.content: Best careers: doctor, vet, artist, or priest They thrive in positions where they can use their creativity and compassion to help good causes. They may also enjoy working in “behind the scenes” roles in a number of industries or fields. This allows them to contribute to causes they care about without being in the spotlight. [6] X Research source A Pisces isn’t generally driven by money and typically only desires enough to achieve their goals or dreams.
